directions.direction: Preheat oven 350 degrees.
In a medium size bowl, mix together cherries and all dry ingredients.
Microwave honey and coconut oil until melted, this makes it easier to mix everything together
Add the vanilla and melted honey and oil over the dry ingredients and toss until everything is coated evenly.
Spread the mixture evenly over the lined cookie sheet.
Bake approximately 10 minutes or until golden brown. Let cool for about 10 minutes before enjoying.
While the granola is baking, prepare the Greek Yogurt and fruit.
Mix together the greek yogurt with honey and clean and slice fruit.
Layer yogurt and berries in a glass and top with granola.
Layer yogurt and berries in a glass and top with granola.

recipe.name: 2 egg whites, hard boiled or scrambled

directions.direction: Spiralize the zucchini and set aside.
In a food processor or blender, add the avocado, clove of garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Process until smooth. Thin the dressing out with water as needed
Combine the garlic powder, onion powder, ground cumin and chili powder in a medium size bowl and mix together.
Cut the chicken into bite size cubes and place in the medium size bowl, mix well
In a medium size skillet warm Oil on medium high heat. Add the Chicken and Spices.
Stir often until Chicken is fully cooked.
Add in the Tomatoes and Zucchini Noodles. Cook for a few more minutes until they are tender.
Remove from heat and add the Avocado Dressing. Mix gently until everything is coated well.
Garnish with Cilantro.

In a medium size skillet warm Oil on medium high heat. Add the Chicken and Spices.
Stir often until Chicken is fully cooked.
Add in the Tomatoes and Zucchini Noodles. Cook for a few more minutes until they are tender.
Remove from heat and add the Avocado Dressing. Mix gently until everything is coated well.
Garnish with Cilantro.
Spiralize the zucchini and set aside.
In a food processor or blender, add the avocado, clove of garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Process until smooth. Thin the dressing out with water as needed

Preheat oven 350 degrees.
In a medium size bowl, mix together cherries and all dry ingredients.
Microwave honey and coconut oil until melted, this makes it easier to mix everything together
Add the vanilla and melted honey and oil over the dry ingredients and toss until everything is coated evenly.

While the granola is baking, prepare the Greek Yogurt and fruit.
